definition: Mandalay, province and second city of Myanmar (Burma)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: The picture shows team appealing for resistance against Japan on the streets of Mandalay.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲工作隊高舉隊旗在曼德勒市街頭宣傳抗日。

sentences.english: RL: When do you open the Mandalay Bay show?
sentences.chinese: 曼德勒海灣演出什麼時候開演？

sentences.english: Many years ago, I led a group of pilgrims from Shwebo to visit pagodas in Mandalay and Rangoon.
sentences.chinese: 多年以前，我領一個朝聖團從雪布去曼德勒參觀佛塔。

sentences.english: The Manderlys had always been loyal subjects to the Starks and enemies of the Boltons.
sentences.chinese: 作爲波頓家族的對頭，曼德勒家族一直忠於史塔克家。

sentences.english: Beginning from the late Konbaung period, the Panthays started to settle in Mandalay, the royal capital.
sentences.chinese: 從貢榜王朝晚期開始，“潘泰”開始在曼德勒定居。

sentences.english: The day when Mandela helped me was one of my happiest.
sentences.chinese: 曼德勒幫助我的那天時我人生中最快樂的一天。

definition: Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Naypyidaw or Nay Pyi Taw, capital of Myanmar
another name for Mandalay 曼德勒, Myanmar's second city
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
